languages.text: "Благодарю, Торбальд. Вы с братьями тоже бились достойно, не уронили чести Волков. С радостью подниму с тобой чашу на победном пиру, Железношкурый".
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Торбальд. Вы с братьями тоже бились достойно, не уронили чести Волков. С радостью подниму с тобой чашу на победном пиру, Железношкурый".

traits.locale_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."
"I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

languages.text: “谢谢你，索巴德。你和你的兄弟们战斗得非常勇猛，你们让群狼感到骄傲。我很高兴能与你在胜利之宴上共饮一杯，铁皮。”
languages.original_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，索巴德。你和你的兄弟们战斗得非常勇猛，你们让群狼感到骄傲。我很高兴能与你在胜利之宴上共饮一杯，铁皮。”

languages.text: « Je te remercie, Thorbald. Tes frères et toi avez fait honneur aux Loups dans ce combat. Je me ferai une joie de trinquer avec toi au banquet de la victoire, Peau-de-Fer. »
languages.original_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

traits.locale_text: « Je te remercie, Thorbald. Tes frères et toi avez fait honneur aux Loups dans ce combat. Je me ferai une joie de trinquer avec toi au banquet de la victoire, Peau-de-Fer. »

languages.text: 「ありがとう、トールバルド。お前と兄弟たちはよく戦った。狼たちの誇りだ。アイアンハイド、勝利の宴でお前と杯を交わせればこの上ない喜びだ」
languages.original_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、トールバルド。お前と兄弟たちはよく戦った。狼たちの誇りだ。アイアンハイド、勝利の宴でお前と杯を交わせればこの上ない喜びだ」

languages.text: «Te lo agradezco, Thorbald. Tus hermanos y tú habéis luchado de maravilla; los Lobos tienen motivos por los que sentirse orgullosos. Será un placer compartir una copa contigo en el banquete de victoria, Piel de Hierro».
languages.original_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

traits.locale_text: «Te lo agradezco, Thorbald. Tus hermanos y tú habéis luchado de maravilla; los Lobos tienen motivos por los que sentirse orgullosos. Será un placer compartir una copa contigo en el banquete de victoria, Piel de Hierro».

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch, Thorbald. Ihr und Eure Brüder habt gut gekämpft, Ihr habt die Wolves stolz gemacht. Es wird mir eine Freude sein, beim Siegesgelage einen Humpen mit Euch zu teilen, Eisenhaut."
languages.original_text: "I thank you, Thorbald. You and your brothers fought well, you did the Wolves proud. It will be my joy to share a cup with you at the victory feast, Ironhide."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch, Thorbald. Ihr und Eure Brüder habt gut gekämpft, Ihr habt die Wolves stolz gemacht. Es wird mir eine Freude sein, beim Siegesgelage einen Humpen mit Euch zu teilen, Eisenhaut."
